PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-08092013-06-13,  CH,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of RAJ SHOAN of Toronto, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; designate RAJ SHOAN for the Ontario region, as established under subsection 10(1.1) of the Act; and determine that RAJ SHOAN shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Ontario regional Office, effective June 3, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
